attack_line: The MONSTER's teeth, sharp as dagger, seek to tear out a chunk of your midsection.
They lunge forth, bearing down on you with their vile teeth and disgusting breath.
The MONSTER is cautious at first... snapping at you from a distance, searching for a taste...
The teeth of a monster... this MONSTER licks its lips before bearing down on you.
The MONSTER strikes quickly, hoping to capture an easy morsel off guard.
It attacks wildly and viciously, first with its claws, then its teeth, roaring as it does.
The MONSTER leaps into the air, trying to sink their teeth into your neck.
